comments:
Steps to reproduce:
1.Put the attached library to the resource folder
2.New a report, includes the library, extends lib.parameter
3.Edit the parameter

Expected result:
Parameter dialog can be opened

This bug is depends on 156324, which is an 2.2.0 bug. Downgrade the priority.
